results.title: Antioxidant effect of simvastatin throught oxidative imbalance caused by lisdexamfetamine dimesylate.
results.text_hl: The present study aims to directly investigate the behavioral and antioxidant effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a model of @<m>DISEASE_Bipolar_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001714 @@@bipolar mania@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Lisdexamfetamine_Dimesylate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069478 @@@lisdexamfetamine dimesylate@@@.

citations.NLM: Eger GA, Ferreira VV, Batista CR, Bonde H, de Lima DD, Wyse AT, da Cruz JN, Rodrigues AF, Magro DD, da Cruz JG. Antioxidant effect of simvastatin throught oxidative imbalance caused by lisdexamfetamine dimesylate. An Acad Bras Cienc. 2016 Mar;88(1):335-48. PMID: 26871491
